Description:
Good Experience on Oracle Service Bus and SOA Suite 11g and 12c.
Good at Troubleshooting Application related issues quickly & providing resolutions.
Good at installation, troubleshooting, performance tuning, code deployment, patching, and upgrades.
Good at understanding the system requirements & prepare Interface specification documents.
Should have worked on the design of SOA services/web services, SOAP, Rest Services, WSDL, XSD, XML, XPath, JSON, and XSLTs.
Proficiency in working on Unix and Linux platforms.
Experience in designing SOAP and RESTFUL services.
Ability to understand the end-to-end customer journey.
Should have excellent written, communication & leadership skills.
Good knowledge of SOA principles & architecture, SOA SUITE components like BPEL, BAM, ADAPTERS, etc
Identify the low-level development tasks and ensure correct implementation by the team by ensuring the right approaches, standards, and processes are followed.
Ensure that based on the provided design specifications, the team develops web services, transformation mappings and integration flows correctly.
Develop detailed transformation rules using XSLT / XQuery / Custom code based mapping.
Provide detailed documentation/annotations on WSDLs to describe the usage scenario.
Ensure that design & code reviews and walkthroughs are conducted.
Resolve & guide the dev team on technical issues faced during design & development.
Have a clear inclination towards automation of the design, development, test and deployment processes to enhance the rapid delivery of services.
Ensure that existing coding guidelines, standards, and best practices are followed and applied by development teams.Job Details
